thread.title: Ankit Gera Bigg Boss 9 contestant: Meet the hot boy of the season?
thread.title_full: Ankit Gera Bigg Boss 9 contestant: Meet the hot boy of the season?

author: Prathamesh Jadhav | India.com Entertainment Desk
title: Ankit Gera Bigg Boss 9 contestant: Meet the hot boy of the season?
text:
Ankit Gera Bigg Boss 9 contestant: Meet the hot boy of the season? By India.com Entertainment Desk on October 11, 2015 at 11:40 PM Comments 
Bigg Boss 9 premier is dishing out an unmatched dose of entertainment. The ‘double trouble’ edition has lots of hoopla and drama laced with tremendous oomph. Here’s the hot boy from tele-land Ankit Gera making his scorching presence felt. Born on September 1, 1987 Gera made his small screen debut with the popular series Mahi Way. His charming persona coupled with his sharp looks got him noticed. His character Nikhil on the show helped him garner immense popularity. 
He is currently the face of Zee TV’s popular series Sapney Suhaney Ladakpan Key. The 28 year old Delhi boy was also seen in Pratigya, yet another popular TV show. Apparently, he always wanted to be an actor and he plays soccer in his past time. Don’t miss this! Bigg Boss 9 house leaked pictures: See Salman Khan’s exclusive ‘Double Trouble’ Bigg Boss house! 
Here’s how we rate the TV star. 
His entry: 6.5 on 10 
Style quotient: He is quite a playboy and styles himself well 8 on 10 
How promising does he look? His good looks can him him places 8 on 10 
Will he win the show just the way Gautam Gulati did? You tell us! 
  11, 2015 11:40 PM Topics:
